name: vcfeval_hap.py
summary: v1.0 - Use vcfeval and hap.py to calculate NGS performance metrics against truth set (based on precisionFDA app)

inputSpec.name: query_vcf
inputSpec.label: Query VCF
inputSpec.help: VCF file containing queryset variants (.vcf or .vcf.gz)

inputSpec.name: truth_vcf
inputSpec.label: Truth VCF
inputSpec.help: VCF file containing truthset variants (.vcf or .vcf.gz)

inputSpec.name: panel_bed
inputSpec.label: Panel BED
inputSpec.help: BED containing region (e.g. panel) covered in queryset vcf

inputSpec.name: high_conf_bed
inputSpec.label: High Confidence BED
inputSpec.help: BED containing high confidence region for truth set

inputSpec.name: na12878
inputSpec.label: Is the truth set NA12878?
inputSpec.help: If the truth set is NA12878 stratification of results will be performed
